scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of four figures outdoors, with rolling green hills and several towers in the background. On the left, an elderly man with a long white beard, wearing a red cloak over blue garments and a red cap, leans on a staff. In the center, two women, both with halos, are shown embracing. The woman on the left wears a blue robe, and the woman on the right wears a red cloak over a golden garment and a white veil. To the right, a woman in a blue dress and red cap holds a book. The architectural elements visible are towers with red roofs, suggesting a fortified or urban setting.
